text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmhmhm!? In the corner of the hallway, the one secretly handing something over is…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You two suspicious ones over there! Show me what you just hid!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I-i-i-it's not suspicious at all!? It's just a super normal book――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hiding it means you have a guilty conscience! Come on now, let's see it!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ah!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Uuuuuuuugh～! She saw, she saw, she saw…!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What's the big deal? This is just shoujo manga, is it not?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Y, yes, that's right, Ms. Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: This is… Yeah, it was just a "I'm forcing my favorites on you!" sorta thing!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Are you interested in shoujo manga too, Ms. Bakushin O? T, to think!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hm? Me?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, then, let me take a look, just a tad… "The serious class president and the delinquent student are attracted to each other whilst still repelling one another," hmm.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fantastic!! The class president is the main character―this is without a doubt a masterpiece!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I, is that so? Well, it's sure a masterpiece, but…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: In this manga, the process of the main character, who was so weak-willed, falling in love and becoming strong, I can't get enough of it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I've heard that it can be a bit risqué at times, though…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hoho, becoming stronger and… growing risky…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Very well, I've decided! I'm going to fall in love, too!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Love will give you Bakushin-like strength! I'll win even the riskiest of battles!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――and that is why!
choice_data_list: So you want to fall in love…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But I have never been in love! What the hell is love supposed to do!
choice_data_list: Like finding someone you care about?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But I have never been in love! What the hell is love supposed to do!
choice_data_list: Like finding someone you care about?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Mmm-hmm! So what do we do when we find it!
choice_data_list: You should try telling her how you feel.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's a way of expressing your daily favors. It sure feels good to do that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Expressing favors makes me feel warm and empowered—I get it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Then I'll go tell everyone as soon as I can! Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I love it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh…! Ba, Ms. Bakushin O…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I love it!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: What? That… I also like your straightforwardness, don't you?
The reactions of the girls varied, but Sakura Bakushin O's confession caused a lot of confusion around her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh, I've finished expressing my feelings! I'm sure this has made me even stronger!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, no! I didn't tell the most important person!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I love you, trainer! Thank you for always supporting me!!!
It's true that both the person who expresses her feelings and the person who is expressed her feelings feel warm and fuzzy.
Sakura Bakushin O's actions were far from love, but she had something to gain in her own way.
I couldn't think of any advice I could give about love, so I apologized honestly.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, no, don't worry about it! Then we just have to learn together!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, just in time, Ms. Urara! Ms. Urara!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hello, Ms. Bakushin-o! What's going on?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I need some advice about love! Do you know anything about it!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Koi～? Say-chan said you caught a lot of fish at the pond in the park?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Are you sure? Then we must head for the park as soon as possible!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer, here we go! In search of massive amounts of love, come on, Baxcene!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ahh, so love is brewing in this pond! Now I'm looking forward to it!
choice_data_list: No, I thought you meant the fish carp.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmm, you certainly have a point. Then let's aim for the carp!
My advice seems to have been passed over lightly… I made up my mind and decided to go fishing with her until she was satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Mmm-hmm. I'm sure I'm feeling it right now, at this very moment.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The thrill of wondering if it will come or not. This is the thrill of falling in love with a koi!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: She who controls the carp, controls the love! I'm sure that's what it's all about!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Here comes the carp! I'm going to catch it!
After that, the two of us persevered and managed to catch a carp.
Sakura Bakushin O was pleased with the results: "I feel stronger! I feel stronger!
